Fun.TableName:
(SELECT d.YCMC, g.`NAME` AS ZT_BM, h.`NAME` AS LX_BM, a.ID AS GZID , a.LB, a.WJNR, a.MC, a.GBSJ, a.GBWH, a.SSSJ, a.ZT, i.* FROM HPF_JGJS_ZXBHGLFGGZ a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.BM, b.YCMC FROM HPF_YCJCXX_SJWHYC b
) d ON SUBSTRING(a.GLYCBTID, 1, 5) = d.BM LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.`NAME`, f.`CODE`, '1' AS type FROM ysj_domain_enumitem f WHERE f.ENUMID = '1E46BA82-6955-4497-A9F0-10399AEAE2F5' ) g ON a.ZT = g.`CODE` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.`NAME`, f.`CODE`, '2' AS type FROM ysj_domain_enumitem f WHERE f.ENUMID = 'EA248F9B-D2E0-47CC-9CDB-E211AAA674E2' ) h ON a.LB = h.`CODE` LEFT JOIN HPF_JGJS_ZXFGXGWD i ON a.ID = i.FGID )z
